identity.mission: Create a 'Neo-Academic' study platform that blends the warmth of physical paper with the precision of AI. Avoid generic SaaS tropes.
principles: Fusion: Academic Tradition x Cyberpunk Focus
Content: The study material is the hero

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Stat numbers

body.usage: Long form text, Flashcard content, UI labels

mono.usage: Code snippets, Technical terms, Tiny labels

colors.theme_strategy: Hybrid Toggle (Paper Light / Deep Focus Dark)

usage_rules.gradients: Use subtle noise gradients, NO linear generic gradients. Example: 'bg-gradient-to-b from-transparent to-black/5'
usage_rules.borders: Use 1px borders with 10% opacity for a 'technical' feel.
usage_rules.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with 1px white/10 border for sticky headers.

spacing_system.base: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for containers.
spacing_system.grid_strategy: Bento Grid. Mix 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cells. Never equal columns.

patterns.dashboard: Asymmetric Bento Grid. Hero stat (col-span-2) + Quick Actions (col-span-1).
patterns.study_mode: Focus Mode. Center stage content, dimmed peripherals. Minimal UI.
patterns.marketing: Large typography, overlapping elements, scroll-triggered reveals.

overrides.Button: Rounded-full for actions, sharp corners for filters. Hover: scale-105.
overrides.Card: No shadow by default. 1px border. Hover: shadow-lg + border-primary/50.
overrides.Input: Bg-transparent, border-b only (for forms) or full pill shape (for search).
overrides.Dialog: Backdrop blur-md. Modal animation: scale-95 to scale-100.

custom_components: StreakCounter: Fire icon with animated glow.

images.strategy: Mix of high-quality photography (students) and abstract data art (neural networks).

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle grain overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app to reduce digital harshness.
visual_enhancers.3d_elements: Use 'tsparticles' for a subtle 'neural network' background in the Hero section.

do_not: Center text by default (unless it's a headline).
must_do: Ensure Dark Mode is not just 'black' but 'rich dark grey'.
Make the study interface distraction-free (hide nav bar in focus mode).
